newsitem.title: UK: S&P rates Venantius programme AAA local currency.
newsitem.headline: S&P rates Venantius programme AAA local currency.

text.p: - Standard & Poor's said on Wednesday it assigned its AAA local currency long-term rating to Venantius AB's 10 billion crown Swedish medium-term note programme.
"Venantius' ratings reflect the company's strong relationship with the Kingdom of Sweden, which has AA plus/A1 plus foreign currency and AAA local currency debt ratings," S&P said in a statement.
"The outlook for the sovereign long-term foreign currency rating is negative, while the outlook for the local currency rating is stable," it said.
S&P said the stable outlook reflected the stable local currency rating outlook on its parent, the Kingdom of Sweden.

"The higher sovereign local currency rating and stable outlook reflect the government's flexibility in taxing, its influence over monetary maters, and its commitment to low inflation," the agency said.
